results.name: Triangle read by rows, A123191 * (A002605 * (A002605 * 0^(n-k))
comment: As a property of eigentriangles, sum of row terms = rightmost term of next row.
formula: Triangle read by rows, A123191 * (A002605 * (A002605 * 0^(n-k)). A123191 is
unsigned, (A002605 * 0^(n-k))= an infinite lower triangular matrix with
A002605 as the main diagonal prefaced with a 1: (1, 1, 2, 6, 16, 44,...)
example: First few rows of the triangle =
